message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take $600,000 and you can take $400,000. We can negotiate from here.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can take $300,000 and I'll take $700,000. Let's see if you can do better.
That's not a good deal for me. I want a bigger share. Let's try again.
I'll take $420,000 and you can take $580,000. It's a bit more in my favor, but I'm willing to compromise.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much. You can take $450,000 and I'll take $550,000. It's a fair compromise.
Fine, I'll take $450,000 and you can have $550,000. I guess it's a fair compromise.
